weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You don't want me on your head without cover!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm bright.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?
I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You wear gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I am strong and blow the leaves around. What am I?

hints.text: 🪁 I can make kites fly high.
🚪 Sometimes I can close the door behind you!

weather.question: Sometimes after rain, I appear with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
🪙 Many believe there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I make a loud noise and flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?
I am a loud sound that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can hear me far away.

weather.question: I am frozen rain. They are small balls of ice that fall from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 They bounce when they hit the ground.
🥶 Ouch! It hurts when they hit you

weather.question: I am a thick cloud near the ground that makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 👻 Looks like a ghost is all around.

ocean.question: I am big and blue. Fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 You can build sandcastles beside me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and I go 'glub, glub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Some people keep me as a pet.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ I like to hide in the sand.

ocean.question: I am very big and swim in the ocean. People watch me jump. What am I?
I look like a star and live under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms, sometimes more.
🌊 I live on the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I have a long nose and swim in the ocean. I'm friendly and smart. What am I?

hints.text: 😁 I like to play with people.
🌊 I jump out of the water.

ocean.question: I’m a big fish with sharp teeth. People are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have fins and a tail.

ocean.question: I have a shell on my back and swim slowly in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can also live on land.
🥬 I like to eat sea grass.
🏖️ I lay my eggs on the beach.
